titles.title: A resolution commending John E. Dolibois for dedication to his country, contributions to global education, and more than a half century of service to humanity.
A resolution commending John E. Dolibois for dedication to his country, contributions to global education, and more than a half century of service to humanity.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends and appreciates John E. Dolibois for his lifetime of service and achievements in global education, understanding, and diplomacy for this country and the world community.
